name: Magnum Bullets: Case Closed (windows)
description:
Noir detective Magnum Bullets has another case to solve. when the wealthy daughter of a well known business tycoon is found dead.  Bullets must solve the clues, question the suspects, and ultimately solve the murder of Mr. Mason.

  • 8-bit game style
  • Solve the slew of puzzles to help unravel the mystery
  • Careful, answer the puzzles wrong and you will be given a bad clue
  • Join the hapless hero Magnum on another (mis)adventure
  • Question the various suspects
  • Takes place before the events of Magnum Bullets: The Trouble with Elder gods
